name: Tyranitar
description: The Armor Pokémon. Tyranitar is so overwhelmingly powerful, it can bring down a whole mountain to make its nest. This Pokémon wanders about in mountains seeking new opponents to fight.

abilities.name: Sand Stream
abilities.description: When this Pokémon enters an outside battle, the weather immediately changes to a Sandstorm for 5 rounds. In the case of another Pokémon with a similar weather ability, the tie goes to the Pokémon with the highest DEX score.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Opponents in combat with this Pokémon cannot eat held berries.
